event.title: [event cancelled] FSFE at Le Capitole du Libre in Toulouse, France

body.p: / Update: The event has been cancelled due to the Paris shootings. / FSFE will be pleased to join the Toulouse event “Le Capitole du Libre” for the first time. With a booth, FSFE activists are looking forward to meeting other associations and individuals. FSFE's French Coordinator and Legal Team member Hugo Roy will give two talks, one is an introduction to free software licenses, the other is a talk about the Skype case, reverse engineering and decompilation law in France and Europe.
